name: HairBand
0:
”Alexa, ask Hair Band to melt my face”
”Alexa, ask Hair Band to say something”
”Alexa, ask Hair Band to sing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hair band
des:
Hear an 80's hair band belt out some sweet screams. Try asking Hair Band to "melt your face," or "belt out something," or simply "scream." New sounds will be periodically added.

Visit the project on GitHub (https://github.com/nshenoy/HairBandAlexaSkill) for source code or to report any issues.

\m/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
